BigIntStringChecksum - Class in com.tiemens.secretshare.math
Data structure to support a "URI-like" string that allows BigInteger values to be encoded as a hex string with a checksum.
BigIntUtilities - Class in com.tiemens.secretshare.math
 
BigIntUtilities.Checksum - Class in com.tiemens.secretshare.math
Converter class : "Bigint Checksum" Input format : String that starts with "bigintcs:", contains Hex groups Example input : bigintcs:005468-697320-697320-6d7920-636174-D23FBD gives BigInteger : 1711994770713785234966317640147316
BigIntUtilities.Checksum() - Constructor for class com.tiemens.secretshare.math.BigIntUtilities.Checksum
 
BigIntUtilities.Hex - Class in com.tiemens.secretshare.math
Converter class : "Hex" Input format : String that starts with "0x", contains 0-9A-Fa-f only Example input : 0x54686973206973206d7920636174 gives BigInteger : 1711994770713785234966317640147316
BigIntUtilities.Hex() - Constructor for class com.tiemens.secretshare.math.BigIntUtilities.Hex
 
BigIntUtilities.Human - Class in com.tiemens.secretshare.math
Converter class : "Human" Input format : Any (human readable) string Example input : "This is my cat" gives BigInteger : 1711994770713785234966317640147316
BigIntUtilities.Human() - Constructor for class com.tiemens.secretshare.math.BigIntUtilities.Human
